about_the_game:
This is an action-comedy game where you work part-time as a cashier at a convenience store while dealing with troublesome "annoying customers."

Playing time

Approx. 60 min.

System

Complete the tasks of a convenience store clerk from a first-person perspective.
While scanning items with the cash register scanner, handle annoying customers.
If you leave these troublesome customers unattended, you will receive penalty points, so it is recommended to deal with them as soon as possible.

Story

The protagonist, "Ippatsu," is a young man who recently moved to "Ichigeki City."
On his first day of his part-time job at a convenience store, the store manager leaves for an important (fake) errand.
The convenience store is then flooded with annoying customers who enter the refrigerator or scribble on the walls...!
Can Ippatsu, left alone to run the store on his first day, fend off the annoying customers and successfully complete his part-time job? Ippatsu's lonely battle begins now.

About gameplay videos and streaming

Feel free to create and share gameplay videos or live streams of the game.
We would appreciate it if you could include the game title and a link to the game in the description of your videos, although it is not mandatory.

name: I Am Part-time Worker!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 4800H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX2060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This is an action-comedy game where you work part-time at a convenience store register while taking down troublesome "nuisance customers."
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
